# Import Dependencies

```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(astsa)
library(tidyverse)
library(tswge)
library(tseries)
library(forecast)
library(knitr)
```


# Import Data

```{r}
nfl = read.csv("nfl_attendance.csv")

head(nfl)
```

# Format Data

```{r}
nfl.cumulative = nfl %>%
  group_by(year, week) %>%
  summarize(attendance = sum(weekly_attendance, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()

head(nfl.cumulative)
```

# Plot Time Series

```{r}
nfl.cumulative.ts = ts(nfl.cumulative$attendance, start = c(2000, 1), frequency = 17)

tsplot(nfl.cumulative.ts)
```

# ACF, PACF and Spectral Density

```{r}
acf(nfl.cumulative.ts)
```

```{r}
pacf(nfl.cumulative.ts)
```


```{r}
specDensity = parzen.wge(nfl.cumulative.ts)
```

# Check for stationarity

```{r}
adf.test(nfl.cumulative.ts)
```

# Training/Testing Split

```{r}
nfl.training = nfl.cumulative %>%
  dplyr::filter(year < 2019)

nfl.training.ts = ts(nfl.training$attendance, start = c(2000, 1), frequency = 17)

nfl.testing = nfl.cumulative %>%
  dplyr::filter(year == 2019)

nfl.testing.ts = ts(nfl.testing$attendance, start = c(2019, 1), frequency = 17)
```

# Holt Winters Model

## Additive

### Fit Model

```{r}
hwModel = HoltWinters(nfl.training.ts)
hwForecast = forecast(
  hwModel,
  h = 17
)

tsplot(
  nfl.cumulative.ts,
  main = "NFL Total Attendance Over Time Holt Winters Additive Model",
  ylab = "NFL Total Attendance"
)
lines(hwForecast$fitted, col = "red")
lines(hwForecast$mean, col = "blue")

legend(
  "bottomright", 
  legend = c("Observed", "Holt Winters Fit", "Holt Winters Additive Forecast"), 
  lty = 1, 
  col = c("black", "red", "blue")
)
```

### Model Evaluation

```{r}
hwResiduals = hwForecast$mean - nfl.testing.ts
acf(hwResiduals)
Box.test(hwResiduals)
rmse.hw = rmse(nfl.testing$attendance, hwForecast$mean)
rmse.hw
```

## Multiplicative

### Fit Model

```{r}
hwModel2 = HoltWinters(nfl.training.ts, seasonal = "multiplicative")
hwForecast2 = forecast(
  hwModel2,
  h = 17
)

tsplot(
  nfl.cumulative.ts,
  main = "NFL Total Attendance Over Time Holt Winters Multiplicative Model",
  ylab = "NFL Total Attendance"
)
lines(hwForecast2$fitted, col = "red")
lines(hwForecast2$mean, col = "blue")

legend(
  "bottomright", 
  legend = c("Observed", "Holt Winters Mult. Fit", "Holt Winters Mult. Forecast"), 
  lty = 1, 
  col = c("black", "red", "blue")
)
```

### Model Evaluation

```{r}
hwResiduals2 = hwForecast2$mean - nfl.testing.ts
acf(hwResiduals2)
Box.test(hwResiduals2)
rmse.hw2 = rmse(nfl.testing$attendance, hwForecast2$mean)
rmse.hw2
```

# SARIMA

## Fit Model

```{r}
sarimaModel = sarima(nfl.training.ts, p=6,d=0,q=7,P=0,D=1,Q=0,S=17, details = FALSE)
sarimaForecast = sarima.for(nfl.training.ts, n.ahead = 17, p=6,d=0,q=7,P=0,D=1,Q=0,S=17, plot = FALSE)
```



```{r}
sarimaFit = nfl.training.ts - sarimaModel$fit$residuals

tsplot(
  nfl.cumulative.ts,
  main = "NFL Total Attendance Over Time SARIMA Model",
  ylab = "NFL Total Attendance"
)
lines(sarimaFit, col = "red")
lines(sarimaForecast$pred, col = "blue")

legend(
  "bottomright", 
  legend = c("Observed", "SARIMA Fit", "SARIMA Forecast"), 
  lty = 1, 
  col = c("black", "red", "blue")
)
```

## Model Evaluation

```{r}
sarimResiduals = sarimaForecast$pred - nfl.testing.ts
acf(sarimResiduals)
Box.test(sarimResiduals)
rmse.sarima = rmse(nfl.testing$attendance, sarimaForecast$pred)
rmse.sarima
```


# Linear Regression

## Fit Model

```{r}
nfl.cumulative2 = nfl.cumulative[18:nrow(nfl.cumulative),] %>%
  mutate(
    t = 18:nrow(nfl.cumulative),
    sin17 = sin((2 * pi * t) / 17),
    cos17 = cos((2 * pi * t) / 17),
    attendance.lag = nfl.cumulative$attendance[t - 17]
  )

head(nfl.cumulative2)
```

```{r}
nfl.cumulative2.training = nfl.cumulative2 %>%
  filter(year < 2019)

nfl.cumulative2.testing = nfl.cumulative2 %>%
  filter(year == 2019)

lmModel = lm(attendance ~ sin17 + cos17 + attendance.lag, data = nfl.cumulative2.training)

summary(lmModel)
```

```{r}
lmModel.predict = predict(lmModel, newdata = nfl.cumulative2.testing)

ts.lmModel = ts(lmModel$fitted.values, start = c(2001, 1), frequency = 17)
ts.lmPredict = ts(lmModel.predict, start = c(2019, 1), frequency = 17)

tsplot(
  nfl.cumulative.ts,
  main = "NFL Total Attendance Over Time Linear Regression Model",
  ylab = "NFL Total Attendance"
)
lines(ts.lmModel, col = "red")
lines(ts.lmPredict, col = "blue")

legend(
  "bottomright", 
  legend = c("Observed", "Linear Regression Fit", "Linear Regression Forecast"), 
  lty = 1, 
  col = c("black", "red", "blue")
)
```

## Model Evalutation

```{r}
acf(lmModel$residuals)
Box.test(lmModel$residuals)
rmse.lm = rmse(nfl.cumulative2.testing$attendance, lmModel.predict)
rmse.lm
```

# Final Results

```{r}
plot(
  nfl.testing.ts,
  main = "2019 NFL Total Attendance vs Model Forecasts",
  ylab = "Total Attendance"
)

lines(hwForecast$mean, col = "red")
lines(hwForecast2$mean, col = "blue")

    "Observed",

    "red", 
    "blue",
    "green",
    "orange"
  )
)
```


```{r}
data.frame(
  model = c(
    "Holt Winters Additive",
    "Holt Winters Multiplicative",
    "SARIMA",
    "Linear Regression"
  ),
  rmse = c(
    rmse.hw,
    rmse.hw2,

  )
) %>%
```
